info: Connect your Spotify Client ID and Client Secret to link...

history: Spotify has been developed since 2006 by a team at Spotify AB, Stockholm, Sweden. The company was founded there by Daniel Ek, former CTO of Stardoll, and Martin Lorentzon, co-founder of TradeDoubler. The headquarters are now located in London, while research and development remains based in Stockholm.
success: It's used in 61 countries, has 159 million active users and a library of 35 million songs.
